views
Class EditTaskActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      views.EditTaskActivity

public class EditTaskActivity
extends Activity

This class is an activity which allows the author of a task to edit relevant information

  • Task Name
  • Task Description
  • Task Requirements: Audio, Photo, Text
  • Task Scope: Public/Private
  • Any submissions submitted to the task may be deleted
  • Delete the entire task

Author:
zturchan

onCheckBoxClicked

public void onCheckBoxClicked(View view)
Checkbox handler taken from http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/ui/controls/checkbox.html When the user clicks a checkbox to specify requirements for a task, set the appropriate boolean value for photo, audio and text requirements, which will be passed when the task object is created via the TaskManager

Parameters:
view -

onRadioButtonClicked

public void onRadioButtonClicked(View view)
RadioButton handler taken from http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/ui/controls/radiobutton.html This method is called whenever the suer click on the public/private radio buttons. Clicking a button will select it and deselect the other if appropriate, as well as set a boolean variable or be passed to the new Task object when it is created via the TaskManager.

Parameters:
view -
